text:
Litchfield Digital | Sydney, Australia | Onsite preferred

We're a brand new team of engineers and designers hacking away on several exciting new products across finance, hospitality, fitness, and health. Our stack includes Python/Django, React/Redux, Riot, Swift, and Java.

We're hiring at all levels, experienced engineers in particular. If you're interested, I'd love to hear from you simon@litchfield.digital
